alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Alachua and northwestern Putnam Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from George`s Lake to near Hawthorne. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose, Hawthorne, Melrose Landing, George`s Lake, Florahome, Putnam Hall, Carraway and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
